roleset.name: acquire
roleset.note: ASSUME-V NOTES: VN, FN updated by Julia. Member of VNcls 93. (from assume.01-v)
ASSUMPTION-N NOTES: Updated by Julia. (from assumption.02-n)

roles.note: I doubt the other/higher numbered args will appear, but anything ispossible. (from assume.01-v)

example.name: acquire, take on
example.text: Primerica, as expected, also acquired certain assets of the agency and assumed certain of its liabilities.

example.name: autogen1
example.text: any assumption of additional responsibility by the politicians

example.name: autogen2
example.text: the assumption of an estimated $ 300 million in securedliabilities on those properties
example.arg: of an estimated $ 300 million in secured liabilities on those properties

example.name: with args0, 1, and 2
example.text: Commonwealth Government's assumption of debt from semi-government authorities as part of a privatization process.
example.arg: as part of a privatization process

roleset.name: believe
roleset.note: ASSUME-V NOTES: Important: There is *no* target for the trace! The automatic taggingtries to find one and inevitably picks something wrong. No corresponding VN class. (from assume.02-v)
ASSUMPTION-N NOTES: Updated by Julia. Member of VNcls 93. (from assumption.01-n)

example.name: with a clear assumer
example.text: He suggests, for example, that investors may have assumed that just because UAL couldn't get financing, no leveraged buy-outs can get financing.
example.arg: that just because UAL couldn't get financing, no leveraged buy-outs can get financing

example.name: discourse function
example.text: He also said that after the charges, and `` *trace* assuming no dramatic fluctuation in interest rates, the company expects to achieve near-record earnings in 1990.''
example.arg: no dramatic fluctuation in interest rates

example.name: args 1 &2
example.text: his assumption that global warming is entirely a result of humanactivity
example.arg: that global warming is entirely a result of human activity

example.name: all args
example.text: He never rebutted the government's assumption of him as being a U.S. Citizen.

example.name: just arg2
example.text: A Kremlin spokesperson announced that any assumption about Russian government 's involvement in this poisoning incident was fantastic talk without any evidence
example.arg: about Russian government's involvment in this poisoning incident
